headline: Constitution Pipeline Could Generate Up to $11.6 Billion in Total Savings by Lowering Natural Gas Prices in 'Energy Tight' US Northeast, S&P Global Analysis Finds
summary: Construction of the proposed Constitution natural gas pipeline could provide significant price relief and other economic benefits for the U.S. Northeast region, generating up to $11.6 billion in energy savings for consumers and supporting nearly 2,000 jobs annually over a 15-year period, according to a new analysis by S&P Global.

headline: A Look at S&P Global's (SPGI) Valuation Following Strong Q3 Results and Raised 2025 Guidance
summary: S&P Global (SPGI) delivered higher sales and net income for the third quarter, building confidence with a lift to full-year 2025 earnings guidance. The improved outlook highlights ongoing momentum in the company’s core business. See our latest analysis for S&P Global. After a choppy quarter for the broader market, S&P Global’s latest raised earnings guidance and strong results have helped restore some momentum. The stock’s share price is up modestly for the year, while its one-year total...
